You are responsible for ensuring that yo: Kai ne ke da alhakin tabbatar da cewa kana da haƙƙin doka don bincika ko loda kowace lambar lamba. Muna ba da bayanai bisa samammun bayanan samfur, amma ba mu da garantin daidaito ko cikar sa
We are not liable for any damages that a: Ba mu da alhakin duk wani lahani da ya taso daga amfani da bayanan samfur mara daidai ko tsufa. Da fatan za a tabbatar da bayanan samfur ta hanyar chatbot ɗin mu idan ya cancanta.
The chatbot is provided to help you with: An samar da chatbot don taimaka muku da ƙarin tambayoyin samfur. Amsoshin chatbot don dalilai ne na bayanai kawai kuma ba su zama shawara na ƙwararru ba
